home.title: TAPSOBA Abdoul Kader
home.subtitle: Data Scientist | Web and Mobile Developer | Software Engineer
home.description: Passionate about data analysis and innovative solutions, I aim to contribute to strategic projects as a Data Analyst, leveraging my skills in machine learning, data visualization, and predictive analysis to anticipate trends and add value to business decisions.

one.title: Microsoft Certified: Power BI Data Analyst Associate

list.one: Data analysis and Machine Learning with Python

one.title: Power BI Trainer – PL-300 and PL-900
one.description: Conducted a 5-day practical training on using Power BI for data analytics and creating interactive reports. Preparation for PL-300 and PL-900 certifications.

two.title: Web Developer and Data Scientist
two.description: Design and development of a management and assistance application for migration to Canada. Implementation of an intelligent recommendation system and data analysis to improve application performance.

three.title: Data Scientist
three.description: Analysis of Burkinabe population migrations due to conflict and climate change. Development of an AI model for predicting migration flow and a decision-making tool on conflict, migration, and food security.

four.title: Data Scientist
four.description: Collection and preparation of meteorological data. Data analysis for a better understanding of weather in West Africa. Development of a temperature prediction system using Machine Learning and Deep Learning.

one.title: Faso Migration
one.description: Web platform for analyzing migration flow in Burkina Faso and forecasting future migrations for better decision-making.

two.title: Climate Model
two.description: Collection, preparation, and analysis of meteorological data. Development of AI models for completing missing data and weather prediction.
